mapper.select:
select a.id, a.auth_type authType, ROUND(a.personal_max_amount/10000,2) personalMaxAmount, ROUND(a.enterprise_max_amount/10000,2) enterpriseMaxAmount, a.auth_period authPeriod, a.enabled_status enabledStatus, a.remark, a.create_user createUser, a.create_time createTime, a.update_user updateUser, FROM_UNIXTIME(a.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') updateTimeStr, b.truename updateUserStr from hyjf_hjh_user_auth_config a left join hyjf_admin b on a.update_user = b.id
limit #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
